### Writing a winning research application

In this section, we discuss how to write a winning research application. Throughout the year, you will have opportunities to apply to research grants funded by Carleton University or external funders. In this section, we highlight the work winning recipe written by fourth-year student, [Abigail Meloche](https://carleton.ca/economics/2023/second-year-b-econ-student-abigail-meloche-announced-as-successful-candidate-of-curop-2023/)
